name: KimiaVPN
description: New update changes version 3.1.8  -In addition to the IKEv2 service -Add Stunnel service -Upgrade servers to more than 30 countries -Addition of special Kimia Plus service -Show the number of users logged in with the account -Cisco service upgrade and connection speed increase -User lock if more than 2 users log in to the program -Addition of Kimia Socks service for using proxy in Telegram
